resources.string: Below each Ishihara plate you will see buttons with option. Choose the one that best suits what you see after you have observed the image. Som may be ambiguous, so choose instinctively without thinking to much
Touch back again to close application
Color blind test app using Farnsworth Munsell formula with 40 Hue colors. Detail about this app and source code visit https://github.com/mustofa-id/color-blind-test
Are you sure want to check test result?\nIt\'s will finishing your test!
Total error score based on Farnsworth Munsell formula is %1$d

The test consists of 24 (short version) plates designed to provide a test that gives a quick and accurate assessment of color vision deficiency of congenital origin. The test is designed to detect the two most common types of color blindness: Protanopia, total or partial red blindness, and Deuteranopia, the absolute or partial deficiency to perceive green.

The Farnsworth-Munsell 100 hue test is one of the most famous color vision tests available. It belongs to the group of hue discrimination, also called arrangement tests. The aim of the test is to order the shown color plates in the correct orderâ€”any misplacement can point to some sort of color vision deficiency.
